name: The GUIDON Official Website
description: The GUIDON is the official publication of the Ateneo de Manila University. I was part of the development team for the revamp of their website, as well as one of the leads for the project when I was the Digital Development Editor for the organization.

name: A Geography of Goodbyes
description: This interactive was a commemoration for the restaurants and locations near Katipunan that were closed due to the pandemic. It is a simple geography map with articles about each location in the area. This was developed in Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS

name: Creativity in Crisis
description: This interactive is a showcase of the various creative releases of The GUIDON in the SY 2020-2021.

name: Shipwreck Adventure Game
description: This was a game that includes web apps that I created and integrated into Storyline Articulate as an internship for Coca Cola. The game was created as a learning and bonding experience for the employees and staffs within the company. The game featured various functionalities that I developed including messaging amongst teammates, puzzles, Azure uploads, backend troubleshooting, and more.

name: GoodTech PH Official Website
description: This is the official website of GoodTech that I built with Wordpress. This website showcases what the company is all about and the products that they have to offer.
